questions.question: What is social change?

choices.answer: how human interactions transform cultural and social institutions over time
how economic activity changes how humans interact
how economic activity affects and is shaped by social processes
something that will have a dramatic change in the future

questions.question: What is economic change?

choices.answer: a shift in the structure of an economic system
changes to societies, cultures and everyday life on a national basis
a social science concerned with the production of goods and services

questions.question: What century did Inventions and economic developments helped transform America?
What were the name of the painters and scientists who built an electromagnetic telegraph in 1837?

choices.answer: Samuel F.B. Morse and Leonard Gale
James Clerk Maxwell and William Thomson
Sir Charles Wheatstone and Sir William Cooke

questions.question: What is The Industrial Revolution?

choices.answer: a series of events that marked the emergence of modern science
production resulting in massive changes in social and economic organization
transition of many human cultures from hunting and gathering to agriculture

questions.question: North was a manufacturing region and the South was agricultural
What was the basic difference in how the economies of the North and South developed?

choices.answer: The emergence of a Cotton Kingdom in the South contributed to slavery
The south and north disagreed on slavery
Slavery declined in the North, but some slaves remained there for decades
North was developing an industrial economy, while the South was agriculture

choices.answer: to encourage people to reform their lives

questions.question: What happened during the period of the market revolution?

choices.answer: People increasingly bought and sold goods rather than making them
